mapper.select: select work_id, work_week, employee_id, work_morning, work_afternoon, room_id, work_deal, work_date from `work`

SELECT room.room_id, room.room_name, room.branch_id, room.room_address, `work`.work_id, `work`.work_week, `work`.employee_id, `work`.work_morning, `work`.work_afternoon, `work`.room_id, `work`.work_deal, `work`.work_date FROM room , `work` WHERE room.room_id = `work`.room_id AND room.branch_id = #{branchId} and `work`.work_date=#{time}

SELECT `work`.work_id, `work`.work_week, `work`.employee_id, `work`.work_morning, `work`.work_afternoon, `work`.room_id, `work`.work_deal, `work`.work_date, work_time.work_time_id, work_time.work_time1, work_time.work_time2, work_time.work_time3, work_time.work_time4, work_time.work_time5, work_time.work_time6, work_time.work_time7, work_time.work_time8, work_time.work_time9, work_time.work_time10, work_time.work_time11, work_time.work_time12, work_time.work_time13, work_time.work_time14, work_time.work_id FROM `work` , work_time WHERE `work`.work_id = work_time.work_id AND `work`.employee_id =#{employeeId} AND `work`.work_date = #{workDate}
mapper.insert: insert into `work`(work_week, employee_id, work_morning, work_afternoon, room_id, work_deal, work_date) values (#{workWeek}, #{employeeId}, #{workMorning}, #{workAfternoon}, #{roomId}, #{workDeal}, #{workDate})
mapper.update:
update `work`
work_week = #{workWeek},
employee_id = #{employeeId},
work_morning = #{workMorning},
work_afternoon = #{workAfternoon},
room_id = #{roomId},
work_deal = #{workDeal},
work_date = #{workDate},
where work_id = #{workId}
